column4: anything that involves the chimes crashes, so i think it  may be something to do with that, but i've already deleted .Xauthority and .ICEauthority
does it work to restart X when it freezes?
i'm a bit nooby, so I don't know what that really is tbh :/
what do you do when it freezes?
i reset the pc and come ask for help :P
/server irc.freenode.net gets you connected to freenode, then /join #ubuntu
ya, thats a better idea, reset and ctrl+alt+f2 gets you to a terminal, then irssi starts irc, then /server irc.freenode.net gets you connected to freenode, then /join #ubuntu
that is just to get you h ere while in ubuntu...
although i didn't actually try to restart X
what should I try now then? :/
did you reboot after having locked up? what os are you in?
i rebooted, and went back into text mode and irssi
ok, good, well, dunno, you can try reading some logs, like dmesg
i dont know how to fix it.
